Won the "Next Great HR Technology Company"- love seeing this. They are also hiring SDRs & AEs.

We are Coolfire Solutions, proud creators of The Ronin Platform.  We know that seismic shifts occur in businesses when the right person has the right data at the right time—these are the essential elements required for meaningful decision making. That’s why this is our brand promise:Right data. Right hands. Right now.

Launched in 2011 as the first purely B2B (“dock to dock” freight) online freight marketplace, Post.Bid.Ship connects shippers’ (companies with goods to ship) spot market (non-contract) capacity needs with carriers’ (trucking companies) spot market capacity in real-time.
An award winning SaaS cloud platform that lets marketers amplify their paid advertising by creating and managing near-instant mobile + social + digital campaigns.

EPIC Research & Diagnostics has developed ClearView, an innovative new medical device which quickly and non invasively provides an objective, quantitative profile of organ systems and structures to empower informed clinical action.

SpinGo is a massive SaaS based event database that provides relevant, customized information to a variety of online calendars. We affiliate with media companies, such as newspapers, TV stations, radio stations, and magazines to provide them with a powerful calendar application as a resource for their end users. SpinGo maintains the calendar content for them - they just focus on promoting their site and slick new calendar. In addition, we provide an automated tool for an affiliate to monetize their calendar by selling promotional options for event listings. SpinGo is focused on helping our affiliates make money.

If Tom called and told me he had an opportunity for me on Mars, my response would be...when do we leave.  Tom helped me shift my professional career from being a passive participant to an active driver with my foot on the gas pedal.  Tom has the uncanny ability to be positive. He creates an infectious buzz around him. Modeling his style in my life has been one of the great gifts I have learned from being an employee and now a friend.

summary: Executive/management; 30+ yrs software/technology specializing in early stage organizational development, marketing/sales, market expansion, positioning, international, capital formation, M&A.The last 20 years, focused on launching start-up technology ventures including Chief Revenue Officer, SocialWhirled, a SaaS based digital marketing platform, President, EPIC Research & Diagnostics, a dynamic new medical device for early stage disease detection. CEO at SpinGo, a customizable online database of events made available to partner (affiliate) websites and CEO at Ethix Media, makers of a web based SaaS application (Homeminders) used by large enterprises to effectively ensure their customer for life marketing strategies. CEO of Involve Technology, SaaS sales knowledge automation tool and CEO of venture-backed Hard Dollar Corporation, an integrated estimating and project management software company servicing the infrastructure construction industry. At Cyclone Commerce, Inc., EVP Marketing, strategic positioning, raising capital; growing from $1MM to $14MM in two years.Board member/advisor to Mindspace, a leading gamification creative agency; Iris, an innovative PR metric management system for agencies and brands; DeliveryIT, a web based platform allowing for the delivery of goods and services efficiently& timely; KnowledgeRelay, a business optimization system for the energy industry.  Written extensively and lectured professionally worldwide on sales, marketing and strategic management issues. Co-author of “The Information Technology Challenge”- a strategic and management guide for information technology companies. Southern Illinois University, BS in Mathematics and Physics.
